item.title: What Does It Mean To Write Ethical Code
item.description: Recently I read a report from the 2018 stack overflow survey, here. From the survey: Only tiny fractions of developers say that they would write unethical code or that they have no obligation to consider the ethical implications of code, but beyond that, respondents see a lot of ethical gray. Given the recent investigation into Facebook. I thought it might be prudent to do a little thinking and writing about what it means to write code ethically.
